body: What was the one guy's name...like Armbadore2000? I wanted to know so I could use his skin.

title: Remember?

replies.body: Don't copy skins is not nice :P

replies.body: why you want to copy ambamore skin?

replies.body:
Yes, me. First of all, I don't know you, so I wouldn't really like that.
Secondly, I was given this skin by someone, and then I customized it like 80%, so I wouldn't allow you to use my skin, as it is a custom one rather than a downloaded one. I am very sorry.
